passage.text: Correction to: DElaying Disease Progression In COPD with Early Initiation of Dual Bronchodilator or Triple Inhaled PharmacoTherapy (DEPICT): A Predictive Modelling Approach
In the original article, the superscript letters denoting the footnotes were missing. The correct figure is given below:
The original article has been corrected.
